meanings.definition: To defeat in a fight or battle.
meanings.sent1: The skilled warrior outfights his opponent with ease.
meanings.sent2: She outfights her fears and emerges stronger each time.
meanings.sent3: In the epic battle of the toys, the teddy bear outfights the action figure.
meanings.sent4: Determination outfights doubt in the arena of success.
meanings.sent5: The underdog outfights the champion, surprising everyone with their victory.

meanings.definition: To engage in combat and emerge victorious.
meanings.sent1: The superhero outfights the villains to protect the city.
meanings.sent2: He outfights his opponents in every challenge he faces.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant outfights the big beetles in a hilarious showdown.
meanings.sent4: Courage outfights adversity in the journey of life.
meanings.sent5: The determined athlete outfights all odds to reach the finish line first.
